title: Betsey Crockett Shay Memorial Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide graduate scholarship support for students majoring in Choral Music or Composition in the College of Music at the University of Colorado Boulder. Women are especially encouraged to apply.
marketingContent: To provide graduate scholarship support for students majoring in Choral Music or Composition in the College of Music at the University of Colorado Boulder. Women are especially encouraged to apply.
